title: Watchtower
runHintCooldown: No previous result yet. Please wait {seconds}s before retrying.
leaveDuringAnalysis: Leaving this page during analysis will interrupt the scan.

noIssuesDesc: All your passwords are strong, unique, and up-to-date.
breachedDesc: These passwords appeared in known data breaches
weakDesc: These passwords are too simple or predictable
reusedDesc: The same password is used across multiple accounts

unsecuredDesc: These entries use HTTP instead of HTTPS
duplicateDesc: Multiple entries with the same website and username
